summary: Changed the female DBARMOR to be UBER!
descriptionHtml:
MrGrimm73\'s Dark Brother Hood Female Improved Armor
---------------------------------------------------

This is a simple texture fux. Only female so far, may add male if
I feel like it; but seeing as I don\'t feel like it, don\'t hold 
your breath lol.

The reds are FAR more blood like, the blacks are FAR more black 
and a LOT less blue :). 

The cowl/hood is slightly different not much;
little darker on the hood, the cowl is slightly more blood red.

The gauntlets are darker/redder <--- not a real word, how awesomes is that?!!?

The boots are a slightly darker red then the rest of the outfit.
-----------------------------------------------------

To install:

1. Extract the zip file to your skyrim root folder (the folder containing
    the TESV.exe
2. If asked do you want to merge \"data\" with \"data\" say YES

3. Do a happy my db-armor looks cooler than yours dance.

4. enjoy

------------------------------------------------------

If you would like to mod or change this file in anyway, you go right ahead
and do so, WITHOUT telling me; I don\'t care/mind. All I did was fux with the TEXS

enjoy.
author: MrGrimm73
